text: Zambezi River at the junction of Namibia (top left), Zambia (top), Zimbabwe (bottom right), and Botswana (bottom left) Lists of borders cover land and maritime borders between countries and territories. ==Lists== *List of countries and territories by land borders *List of countries and territories by land and maritime borders *List of countries and territories by maritime boundaries *List of international border rivers *List of land borders with dates of establishment *List of political and geographic borders ==See also== *Boundaries between the continents of Earth *:Category:Border-related lists
title: Lists of borders
